I.  The centre of pressure on a straight wing moves aft as the angle of attack approaches and exceeds the critical angle of attack.

options.text: I is correct, II is correct.
I is incorrect, II is incorrect.
I is incorrect, II is correct.
I is correct, II is incorrect.
